name: It Calls Me
author: Luis Huerta

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: If my opponent has cards in their discard, do I have to shuffle at least 1 of them into their deck when I play It Calls Me?
A: No. You can choose any number up to 3 to shuffle into their deck, including 0.

flavor_text: I am everything Iâ€™ve learned and more
rules_text: (A character with cost 1 or more can to play this song for free.) Draw a card. Then, choose up to 3 cards from chosen opponent's discard and shuffle them into their deck.
